meanings.definition: In a manner that shows careful attention or watchfulness.
meanings.sent1: She looked observantly at the intricate details of the painting.
meanings.sent2: He always walks observantly through the forest, noticing every sound.
meanings.sent3: The detective observed observantly, trying to catch the sneaky thief.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes moved observantly around the room, as if searching for hidden secrets.
meanings.sent5: The security guard patrolled the area observantly, ensuring no one was breaking the rules.
